attributes.action: The bbcs political bias to the conservative party
attributes.additional_details: Just watch any news programme,or any radio four news reporting.by there political correspondents,ie john penaer amongst other s.totally Tory bias reporting
attributes.background: As a fee payer,I expect unbiased political reporting,but with the bbcs political reporters all I get is totally Tory bias .and blatant bias at that.

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations.

You can find out about the BBC complaints system here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/our_work/complaints_and_appeals/
